data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I don't feel prepared to leave my job and go back to school. I ____ that ____ I ____ a ____ salary, it's ____ to ____ my ____. I ____ know ____ my ____ options ____ limited ____ it. But it is a big step, and one that makes me nervous.
data.partBlankContent: I don't feel prepared to leave my job and go back to school. I kn__ that i_ I wa__ a hig___ salary, it's nece_____ to ea__ my deg___. I al__ know th__ my car___ options a__ limited wit____ it. But it is a big step, and one that makes me nervous.
data.fullContent: I don't feel prepared to leave my job and go back to school. I know that if I want a higher salary, it's necessary to earn my degree. I also know that my career options are limited without it. But it is a big step, and one that makes me nervous.
data.answer: 我还没有做好离开工作回到学校的准备。我知道如果我想要更高的薪水，获得学位是很有必要的。我也知道如果没有它，我的职业选择就会受到限制。但这是一大步，也是让我紧张的一大步。
